creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: figure in profile from PR, bent slightly forward with PR leg raised with knee bent; figure has grey bands around his torso, arms and legs, with black strips of cloth tied at his wrists and knees, and wears a black apron around his waist and a similarly constructed apron around his neck; man has black rings painted around his eyes and mouth; turquoise and coral necklace and earring; man has bits of foliage at his ankles and tucked into the back of his apron, and he holds a small cluster of foliage in his PL hand; slice of watermelon in his PR hand; cut watermelon, LRC; skunk, LLC
title: Clown
